They favour the killer so much, that if he has a barely minimum idea of how the game works and the perks its impossible for all the survivors to win and many killers on top of that make it even more irritating by reghunting players and standing in front of them when they are hooked. BHVR still nerfs survivors and buffs killers making them even more irritating. They even disabled the option to view the profile of other players you are playing with because ppl were dodging.
So, i highly disapprove the game for people who just want to have fun. 

I will change this review when Bhvr changes the above, so i assume never.

Pure PvP/Coop. Short games, competitive system. This game was a challenge to start playing, when you not used being a survivor, the effect killers have on your nerves is quite impressive. 11/10 spooky factor untill you get used to the killer's presence near you. Some never overcome...

Che dire, gioco che ti prende al primo avvio e ti invoglia ancora di pi√π a giocarci sopratutto con gli amici che li senti urlare nel microfono e schiatti dalle risate. Gli sviluppatori sono attivi ma in particolare si interessano al divertimento e alla community  dei giocatori per poi non parlare degli eventi che sono molto belli e intriganti, non voglio dilungarmi troppo e stra-consiglio questo gioco sia da giocare da soli che con amici per farsi due risate.
